mapper.select:
SELECT A.ALC_NO, A.ALC_NM, A.CATE_NO, D.CATE_NM, A.FILE_NO, A.EXP_YN, C.FILE_NM, C.FILE_EXT, B.AVG_GRADE FROM INFORMATION A LEFT JOIN GRADE B ON A.ALC_NO = B.ALC_NO LEFT JOIN ALC_FILE C ON A.FILE_NO = C.FILE_NO , CATEGORY D WHERE A.CATE_NO = D.CATE_NO
AND A.EXP_YN = 'true'
AND A.EXP_YN = 'false'
AND ALC_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{alcNm}, '%')
AND A.CATE_NO = #{cateNo}
ORDER BY ALC_NO LIMIT #{startPage}, 10

SELECT A.ALC_NO, A.ALC_NM, A.VOL, A.PRODUCTOR, A.DETAIL, A.EXP_YN, D.CATE_NO, D.CATE_NM, C.FILE_NM, C.FILE_EXT, B.AVG_GRADE FROM INFORMATION A LEFT JOIN GRADE B ON A.ALC_NO = B.ALC_NO LEFT JOIN ALC_FILE C ON A.FILE_NO = C.FILE_NO , CATEGORY D WHERE A.CATE_NO = D.CATE_NO AND A.ALC_NO = #{alcNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INFORMATION(ALC_NM, CATE_NO, VOL, PRODUCTOR, DETAIL, FILE_NO, EXP_YN) VALUES (#{alcNm}, #{cateNo}, #{vol}, #{productor}, #{detail}, #{fileNo}, #{expYn})
/* insertFileInfo - 파일 등록 */ INSERT INTO ALC_FILE(FILE_NO, FILE_PATH, FILE_NM, FILE_EXT) VALUES (#{fileNo}, #{filePath}, #{fileNm}, #{fileExt})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ALC_FILE WHERE FILE_NO = (SELECT FILE_NO FROM INFORMATION WHERE ALC_NO = #{alcNo})
